Resource.rorinfo: This is a ROR formatted XML document describing the resources of the website http://www.hugegolfstats.com/golf-statistics/Welcome.do. For information about the ROR format, go to www.rorweb.com
Resource.title: HugeGolfStats.com
Resource.desc: Allows golfers to input scores and statistics and will generate reports and graphs showing trends about their game.
